subject: Re: my opinion on the speech to text issue
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
This guy has a thing it's part hardware (the Speakjet), part software 
that produces real time words that is influanced--sometimes to give 
intelligent, and meaningful responses, at the same time it logs the 
allophones used, the words formed, and what level on his antenna caused 
the words, and prints it on a screen. He's the same guy that came up 
with the RS hack. His approach is he just wants more data.

 Frank
